LTDLWOCR.ot:
0014. (B) BROWN & WILLIAMSON TOBACCO CORPORATION RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT Our Telecopier Number is (502) 568-8226 - An Automatic PANAFAX PX-100 - Set on 3 Minutes TO: Mr. Chan Kum Weng Singapore Tobacco Co. Ltd. FROM: Pedro J. Martinez DATE: February 17, 1989 RE: 5'S JAPAN Your 20 cartons arrived safely. We read ventilation and obtained an average of 19.6%. This was a surprise to me since at STC your Q.C. people read 20%; therefore, we expected to read about 23%. Can you please read ventilation on a few cigarettes from the lot that you have there and let me know? The samples that were made at our Development Center only reached 22% instead of the 25% target. We are reviewing the whole matter; however, it looks like we might have to repeat the entire run with higher porosity tipping. I will advise you as soon as a decision is made. By the way, regarding the price increase for Project PARAGUAY, next week we will meet with the Regional Director in charge of the project. We will present all your figures and will advise you of outcome. Best regards, PJM/cw/929 1126z cc: 0. A. Sponsler, Jr. 33
